channel.title: Infrastructure on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy

item.title: Consensys
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The market-leading blockchain technology company founded by Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin, responsible for the critical infrastructure (MetaMask, Infura, Linea) powering the decentralized web.

item.title: xpanse
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: API-first platform that standardizes and aggregates financial services, allowing developers, banks, and fintechs to launch banking, identity, and payment products with a single integration.

item.title: Klaytyn
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: One of the few financial institutions on the Klaytn (now Kaia) Global Governance Council, operating a consensus node to secure Asia’s leading enterprise blockchain.
